tasks.description: Go to the room opposite to 204.
I just baked something in the oven. Can you go and check if it's done?
Get and bring a wrench to room 210 for me, please.
Emergency situation. Please immediately take the first aid kit from the rest area to the nearest toilet to the kitchen.
There is a fire in room 202. Find water from the nearest toiletm to room 202 and use it to extinguish the fire.
The delivery person has brought the food to this floor. Please go and sign for it, and then, considering the distance, deliver it to rooms 205 and 202 as fast as possible.
First, go to the rest area, then pick up a document from the nearest room and deliver it downstairs.
I lost a document while resting on the sofa earlier. Please help me retrieve it and make a copy of it, then bring it to room 205.
Start from room 201 and proceed through all rooms with odd numbers, then go charge yourself.
The robot needs to test its ability to navigate in the hallway during peak hours. Start from the room 212 and proceed through all rooms in order, then finally reach room 200.
